title: Ranked team [Tiger Snakes] R> Bronze - Silver
body:
Hey guys, we're a casual ranked team looking for active players Bronze to Silver but we'll accept any higher ranked players.
We want talkative friendly players that have Curse chat or Skype.

Summoner Name: Mawdred
Age: 17
Gender: Male
Rank: B2
Preferred Role [and/or Champions]: Top, Mid-kassadin, Jungle,
Reason for joining: -
Abit about yourself: I'm from South Australia Adelaide I'm pretty active on LoL, ill log in pretty much everyday. I play a lot of other games this is certainly not my first but it is one of my favourites.  I am friendly easy to talk to and enjoy meeting new people, I've played League of Legends since late season 1 and have been on and off since then. I haven't really focused on ranking up solo queue all that much, but I have always been interested in starting a Ranked team and ranking up with a group.  I mainly play LoL for the fun of it :)

Summoner Name:
Age:
Gender:
Rank:
Preferred Role [and/or Champions]:
Reason for joining:
Abit about yourself:

replies.body:
Summoner Name: Dwok
Age:20
Rank: trying to claw my way out of s5
Preferred Role [and/or Champions]:  sup > mid/adc 
Reason for joining: want to find friendly people who can help me get better but aren't hotheads about it
Abit about yourself: short, big, bony, glutinous, hungry and have been playing league for about 2ish years now?

Hey Dwok, thanks for your interest :) As I've said to Rey, my brother will be away from the internet and won't be able to invite new people to the team for now. I'm going to add you in the meantime and if you're up for it, we can have some normals with the others if they happen to be on as well. Again I'm sorry to both of you that there's going to be some waiting before we get into ranked teams.

Summoner Name: xXReyMCxX
Age: Male
Gender: 17
Rank: s1
Preferred Role [and/or Champions]: Mid (Zed *main* xerath, Tf ori and alot more)
Reason for joining: I've always wanted to play on a squad but when ever i join a team they always seem to disband (i have high hopes for this team)
Abit about yourself: Im a Filipino, I can speak an okay amount of English, I moved to nz for a hope for me and my family to get a better future.

Hey Rey, I'm co-owner of the team. I'm just letting you know you may have to wait a while to be invited. My brother (Mawdred, the owner of the team) might not have internet access for a while as his living situations have changed. In the meantime, I'll add you and we can chat or play normals with other members of the team until he's back again. I'm not sure when that will be, but hopefully we will get this thing started. We've been planning on making a team for a very long time and it's disappointing that now we've finally taken the initiative something like this had to happen. :(

Summoner Name: Osama bin Ladin
Age: 16
Gender: Male
Rank: S4
Preferred Role [and/or Champions]: Top [like half the champs that go top] Mid [diana,oriana]
Reason for joining: Have been playing the game for 4 years but have never seriously gotten into ranked, think its about time I did
Abit about yourself: Im a casual Russian teenager who lives in Sydney. I play a lot of sandbox games outside of league, but always come back to it in the end. Im friendly and can cooperate in a team [mostly], also I like potatoes

Summoner Name: Beatz
Age:20
Gender:male
Rank:G3
Preferred Role [and/or Champions]:Mid and Jungle
Reason for joining:something new
Abit about yourself:i play pretty much every day some weekends ill be away etc etc uh im from NZ so time zones are probably a bit diff but can be worked around :) and yeah go nz in the cricket tomorrow (Y)
